bindings.name: clrAccordionMultiPanel
bindings.description: If true allows multiple panels to be open at the same time.

bindings.name: clrAccordionPanelDisabled
bindings.description: When true this disables click events from opening/closing the panel.

bindings.name: clrAccordionPanelOpen
bindings.description: Use this to set the open or closed state of the panel. it emits the open (true)/ closed (false) state of the panel

methods.name: getPanelStateClasses
methods.description: Public accessor used by the template

methods.name: getAccordionContentId

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Create a specific id for the panel content.

methods.description: Public accessor used by the template

methods.name: getAccordionHeaderId

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Create a specific id for the panel header.

methods.description: Public accessor used by the template

bindings.name: clrCurrentAlertIndex
bindings.description: Sets the current index of alerts in a list

bindings.name: clrCurrentAlert
bindings.description: Provides the currently activated ClrAlert instance

bindings.name: clrAlertClosable
bindings.description: If false, the alert will not be closable by clicking on the top-right "x".

bindings.name: clrAlertClosed
bindings.description: Two-way binding on the state of the alert: opened or closed.

bindings.name: clrAlertType
bindings.description: Sets the type of the alert

bindings.name: clrAlertSizeSmall
bindings.description: Change the size to a small alert

bindings.name: clrAlertIcon
bindings.description: Allows you to customize the alert icon using any icon shape name

bindings.name: clrAlertAppLevel
bindings.description: Changes the alert to be app level at the top of the page

css.name: .alert-text
css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

css.name: .alert-actions
css.description: Defines any action buttons or dropdowns for an alert

css.name: .alert-action
css.description: Defines a button or dropdown to be styled for inside of an alert

bindings.name: clrInMenu
bindings.description: Designate a button for display in the overflow menu.

bindings.name: class
bindings.description: A string of space delimited names that is used on the button element.

bindings.name: name
bindings.description: Assign the button element a name

bindings.name: type
bindings.description: Set the type of button for screen readers.

bindings.name: id
bindings.description: Set the id for the button element.

bindings.name: disabled
bindings.description: Set the disabled attribute for the button element.

bindings.name: click
bindings.description: Listen for the user generated click events..

bindings.name: clrMenuPosition
bindings.options: top-right, top-left, bottom-right, bottom-left, right-top, right-bottom, left-top, left-bottom
bindings.description: Set the position of the overflow menu when it is open.

bindings.name: clrDgLoading
bindings.description: When this is true the datagrid will have an overlay that blocks user interaction and shows a <clr-spinner> that indicates activity associated with retrieving data from a server.

bindings.name: clrDgRefresh
bindings.description: The state object reflecting the page metadata (to, from size & current) and current sorting and filters applied to the data models.

bindings.name: clrDgSelected
bindings.description: An array of all datagrid items that are selected.

bindings.name: clrDgSingleSelected
bindings.description: The single item selected for a datagrid.

bindings.name: clrDgSingleSelectionAriaLabel
bindings.description: aria-label for the single select column header.

bindings.name: clrDgSingleActionableAriaLabel
bindings.description: aria-label for the single action column header.

bindings.name: clrDetailExpandableAriaLabel
bindings.description: aria-label for the expandable row column header.

bindings.name: clrDgPreserveSelection
bindings.description: Preserve datagrid selections after filtering has occurred on the dataset.

methods.name: dataChanged
methods.description: Re-trigger the computation of displayed items manually. (cell width and datagrid height)

methods.name: allSelected
methods.description: Determine if all displayed items are selected. (getter)

css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.description: Two way binding for the open/close state of an action overflow menu.

bindings.name: clrDgColType
bindings.description: Specify the built in filter type for a column.

bindings.name: clrDgField
bindings.description: The object property name that will be used for sorting and filtering in Datagrids that implement the *clrDgItem iterator.

bindings.name: clrDgSortBy
bindings.description: A custom comparator supplied by the consuming application.

bindings.name: clrDgSortOrder
bindings.description: Sets or updates the sorted state of a column.

bindings.name: clrFilterValue
bindings.description: Sets or updates the filtered state of a column.

bindings.name: clrDgColumnResize
bindings.description: Output that emits the width (in px) after a column has been re-sized.

interface.description: The comparator function that sorts Item models.

css.description: css class description

bindings.description: Bind a custom filter that implements the ClrDatagridFilterInterface<T> to a column.

bindings.description: Two way binding for the open state of a column filter.

css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.description: Declares the column as hidable and optionally sets the initial hidden state.

bindings.description: An alternative, two way binding for setting the hidden state or responding to changes when hidden state is emitted.

css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.name: clrDgItems
bindings.description: Structural directive that accepts a list of Items<T> for the datagrid to operate over.

bindings.name: TrackByFunction
bindings.description: Optional trackby function (similar to *ngFor: trackBy).

css.description: Defines the text that is placed into the alert

bindings.name: clrDgPageInputDisabled
bindings.description: Turn on/off the users ability to interact with pagination controls.

bindings.name: clrDgPageSize
bindings.description: Set the number of items per page.

bindings.name: clrDgTotalItems
bindings.description: Set the total number if items in the data set.

bindings.name: clrDgLastPage
bindings.description: Set the last page (e.g for back navigation in the browser).

bindings.name: clrDgPage
bindings.description: Two way binding for the current page in the dataset.

bindings.name: clrDgSelected
bindings.description: Set the selected state of a row item.

bindings.name: clrDgSelectable
bindings.description: Turn on/off the ability of a row item to be selected.

bindings.description: Pass a string that will be used for the aria-label of the button that opens the detail pane.

interface.description: The (optional) starting page number for the slice of data.
The (optional) ending page number for the slice of data.
The page number for the current slice of model data.
DESC (-1), ASC (1), None (0) or a custom comparator used for sorting.
The opposite of the sorting applies to the models
An array of filters that implements ClrDatagridFilterInterface<T> that are applied to the data passed to the datagrid
